pages.title: Bunker Buster
pages.text: $(bold)For when the enemy really won't come out to play.$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_kinetic_head, ordinance_inline_warhead, ordinance_core, ordinance_fins. Place horizontally so the fins stabilize impact.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Fins (T) at the rear, core (0), inline warhead (W), kinetic head (H) up front.
